snippet: Israeli officials said the suspects, from northern Israel, had acquired rifles and practiced shooting in a forest.
abstract: Shin Bet announces arrest of five Palestinian citizens of Israel suspected of supporting Islamic State; suspects are latest of few dozen Arab-Israelis arrested in 2015 on suspicion of activity related to terrorist group.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and DIAA HADID

lead_paragraph: Israeli officials said the suspects, from northern Israel, had acquired rifles and practiced shooting in a forest.

headline.main: Israel Holds 5 Arab Israelis Suspected of Supporting ISIS
headline.print_headline: 5 Palestinian Israelis, Said to Be ISIS Supporters, Are Held

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
